long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Start with a personalized summary that highlights what matters to you, then ask any question for answers aligned with your specific goals. Elevate your video-watching experience and maximize your understanding effortlessly.

✨ Instant Video Summaries: Get auto-generated summaries the moment you start watching, saving you as much as 90% of your viewing time while delivering key takeaways instantly.
⚡ Interactive Q&A: Inquire about the video content and receive responses instantly, effectively doubling your learning efficiency.
🎯 Goal-Oriented Responses: Specify your personal goals to receive summaries and answers that aligned with your needs.
📚 Diverse Summary Formats: Choose from various summary types, including detailed summary, Q&A, glossary, actionable and insights, all designed to meet your unique preferences.
⏭️ Smart Timestamps: Navigate to critical moments in the video effortlessly, allowing you to bypass unimportant content and reduce your viewing time by up to 50%.
🎉 Visual Enhancements with Emojis: Experience improved engagement and retention with emoji-rich summaries that add a fun visual element, boosting comprehension by up to 40%.
🌟 Key Highlights: Automatically highlighted terms and moments ensure you never miss essential information, saving you hours each week on content analysis.
📝 Easy Content Copying: Quickly copy summaries to your favorite note-taking apps like Obsidian or Notion, enhancing your organization and increasing productivity by up to 25%.
🎥 Support for Long Videos: Seamlessly process even extended video content, enabling you to extract insights and summaries from hours of material without missing a beat.

🧠 Your Ultimate YouTube Companion
Whether you’re a student, professional, or casual viewer, our extension is designed to streamline your YouTube experience. Save countless hours each month while significantly improving your understanding and retention of the content.

How to Use:
📥 Install the Extension: Download and install our Chrome extension from the Chrome Web Store.
🎥 Start Watching: Open any YouTube video, then click the "Summarize" button to generate summaries instantly.
💡 Engage with Tailored Insights: Utilize goal-oriented summaries and responses to enhance your learning and retention effortlessly.
